title: Hilary Duff Continues To Wear Hot Bikinis For Our Viewing Pleasure - CraveOnline
text:
Hilary Duff Continues To Wear Hot Bikinis For Our Viewing Pleasure Well done, Lizzie. Feb 23rd, 2017 Photo: Instagram/Hilary Duff 
I don’t know about all you folks, but we sure love ourselves some Hilary Duff . We loved her when she was parading around in a tiny pink bikini , and we loved her when she was just sporting some panties in bed . And how can you not be into the 29-year-old when she continues to hang around at the beach in a bikini? Because that’s exactly what “Lizzie McGuire” has been up to lately. 
Allow us to show you some proof of that below. Hilary Duff Continues To Wear Hot Bikinis For Our Viewing Pleasure
